snippet: Mr. Angelakis was instrumental in Comcast’s $45 billion bid for Time Warner Cable, a deal that remains in regulatory limbo. He will lead a new Comcast-based investment venture.
abstract: Michael J Angelakis will step down as chief financial officer of Comcast and take helm of yet-to-be-named Comcast-based investment venture with $4 billion in capital; management shakeup comes as provider's proposed $45 billion merger with Time Warner Cable remains in regulatory limbo.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Angelakis was instrumental in Comcast’s $45 billion bid for Time Warner Cable, a deal that remains in regulatory limbo. He will lead a new Comcast-based investment venture.

headline.main: Michael Angelakis to Step Down as Comcast Finance Officer
headline.print_headline: Leading Comcast Executive Will Leave to Start Company
